Uses of Interface
ray.rml.Matrix2

  • Packages that use Matrix2 
    Package Description
    ray.rml  

    • Uses of Matrix2 in ray.rml

      Classes in ray.rml that implement Matrix2 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Matrix2f
      An immutable single-precision floating point column-major 2x2 square matrix.
